title: Ommaya Noonaya

tokens.lyric: Om maya nu naya, gang byun sal ja,

lines.raw: [Am]Om maya nu naya, gang byun sal ja,

tokens.lyric: Du re nun ban cha gi nun, kum mo re bit.

lines.raw: [G]Du re nun ban cha gi nun, kum mo re bit.

tokens.lyric: Tui moon ba ge nun gal lipe no-ore

lines.raw: [E]Tui moon ba ge nun gal lipe no-ore

tokens.lyric: Um maya nu naya gang byun sal ja.

lines.raw: [Am]Um maya nu naya gang byun sal ja.

tokens.lyric: I want to live by the river with my family

lines.raw: [Am]I want to live by the river with my family

tokens.lyric: The river shines like the golden sand in the fields;

lines.raw: [G]The river shines like the golden sand in the fields;

tokens.lyric: It glistens to the song of swirling autumn leaves.

lines.raw: [E]It glistens to the song of swirling autumn leaves.

tokens.lyric: I want to live by the riverside.

lines.raw: [Am]I want to live by the riverside.
